titleStmt.title: Proverbs English, French, Dutch, Italian, and Spanish. All Englished and alphabetically digested. By N.R. Gent.
titleStmt.author: N. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Miller at the Star in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With three final advertisement leaves and an additional leaf with "A book of proverbs" printed vertically.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
